spec_data.Name: perl-MetaCPAN-Client
spec_data.Description:
This is a hopefully-complete API-compliant interface to MetaCPAN
(https://metacpan.org/) with DWIM capabilities, to make your life easier.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:22:29 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A comprehensive, DWIM-featured client to the MetaCPAN API
